name: Brick Cube Box
description:
A classic block game which easy to play for many people. Get as many points as you can.

  • Free to play
  • Suitable for all ages
  • Easy to control
  • No time limit
  • Offline play

 

How to play: 

 1. Move blocks to fill up the lines horizontally

2. Blocks can be rotated freely.

3. Try to remove multiple lines at a time to get a higher score.
